summary: A young man helps a woman to come to terms with a traumatizing event of her past.
cast: Isabelle Adjani|Alexandre Astier|Julie-Anne Roth|Victor Chambon|Jean-Charles Simon|Daphné Bürki|Pauline Moingeon Vallès|Élodie Hesme|Sébastien Lalanne|Stéphanie Heiser|Cindy Cayrasso
keywords: traumatic experience|post traumatic stress disorder|psychiatric ward|trauma
title: David et Madame Hansen
